title: Classical Ingenuity - The Legacy of Greek & Roman Architects
description:
Classical Ingenuity - The Legacy of Greek and Roman Architects, Artists, and Inventors
by Charles F. Baker III and Rosalie F. Baker 
Cobblestone Pub | 1993 | ISBN: 0942389077 | scanned PDF | 164 Pages | 19.8 mb

The Legacy of Greek and Roman Architects, Artists, and Inventors : Learn about the artists, architects, and inventors of the ancient Mediterranean world and how their work has inspired future generations. Includes a play, activities, and a teacher 's guide as well as a list of further resources.


CONTENTS
Foreword 5
Maps 6
CHAPTER 1 The Seven Wonders of the Ancient World 8
CHAPTERS The Classical Temple 32
CHAPTER 3 Ancient Artists and Their Crafts 60
CHAPTER 4 Rome's Ingenious Engineers 86
CHAPTER 5 Greek Creativity 110
Cross Companion 140
Further Reading 141
Teacher's Guide 143
Index 155
